welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Waxhaw, a charming town known for its quaint shops, picturesque Main Street, and friendly community. We invite you to experience our southern hospitality and explore all that our charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charlotte Douglas Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Charlotte Douglas Airport primarily serves domestic flights operated by American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Charlotte Douglas Airport primarily serves domestic flights operated by American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Charlotte Douglas Airport primarily serves domestic flights operated by American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at Charlotte Douglas Airport primarily serves domestic flights operated by American Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse E
terminals.description: Concourse E at Charlotte Douglas Airport primarily serves international flights operated by American Airlines and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
